text: Ta shuo:â€œWo de zuren a! Nimen gaosu wo ba! Jiaru wo you cong wo de zhu jiang shi de mingzheng, bingqie ta yi ba ta de yi xiang jiamei jiyang ci gei wo,[wo neng yanxing buyizhi ma?] Wo buxiang zuo wo suo jinzhi nimen zuo de shi, wo zhi xiang jin wo suo neng zuo wo de gaige. Wo de chenggong quan kao an la [de yindao]. Wo zhi xinlai ta, wo zhi gui xin ta.
